Banner.title: El primer intercambio híbrido CEX/DEX de <0>criptomonedas P2P con escrow</0>
Banner.description: Intercambia criptomonedas con personas de todo el mundo, conocidas o desconocidas, de forma rápida, fácil y con la máxima seguridad a través de nuestro escrow descentralizado.

InfoBlock.securityDescription: That's iEscrow's slogan. All the development of our platform had security as it's main premise, which is the reason we executed two security audits.
InfoBlock.missionDescription: Our mission is to totally eliminate the risk of scam in case you want to transact with someone you don't know. You can easily achieve this through our escrow system.
InfoBlock.reputationDescription: We have developed an innovative reputation and rating system, which represents a significant improvement over previous systems.
InfoBlock.adaptabilityDescription: In iEscrow you don't necessarily need to hold your funds inside the platform in order to use our services, since you can complete a p2p escrow transaction by sending the funds directly to the escrow wallet, from any DeFi wallet or centralized exchange. Not only that, you can receive the funds in any address you prefer, wether it's inside iEscrow or in any other address.
InfoBlock.privacyDescription: At iEscrow, we care about the privacy of our users. We not only understand it's important, but we also believe it's your right. That's why we don't implement KYC in countries where it's not mandatory.

Marketplace.title: Discover Your Perfect Match: <0>Explore Our Marketplace</0>
Marketplace.description1: If <0>you already have the other party to make a transaction,</0>your most efficient option would be to <0>make a private escrow.</0>
Marketplace.description2: However, if you want to make a transaction but you´re yet <0>looking for a counterparty,</0> then you can <0>use the marketplace to immediately make the exchange you need.</0>
Marketplace.description3: We have developed an intuitive marketplace...

TradeOnTheGo.title: Opera sobre la marcha. <0>Donde sea, cuando sea.</0>
TradeOnTheGo.description: Escanea para descargar la app <0>iOS y Android</0>
